feed.title: Hobart Makers Inc.
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: Cider Making Workshop
entry.content: Last night was the first cider making workshop at Hobart Makers. We had 8 students, and everyone had good fun, learned something new, and took some cider-in-progress away with them. Everyone was also keen to try making cider at home now!
entry.summary: Last night was the first cider making workshop at Hobart Makers. We had 8 students, and everyone had good fun, learned something new, and took some cider-in-progress away with them. Everyone was also keen to try making cider at home now!

entry.title: Website refresh
entry.content:
We have recently updated the website - we hope you like it.

The information was getting a bit old before, but now it’s easier to update, hopefully we’ll stay on top of it.
entry.summary: We have recently updated the website - we hope you like it.

entry.title: Cider making workshop announced
entry.content: We now have a cider making workshop on the calendar. 25th May 2017 is the proposed date, see the events page for more details.
entry.summary: We now have a cider making workshop on the calendar. 25th May 2017 is the proposed date, see the events page for more details.

entry.title: First grant received!
entry.content: A big thank you to Shae and the other coordinators of National Science Week. Our recent application for the $500 seed grant was successful! This means we’ll receive the necessary funding to run the LoRa (long range) radio demonstration we’ve been planning for National Science Week this August. Fantastic news. :smiley:
entry.summary: A big thank you to Shae and the other coordinators of National Science Week. Our recent application for the $500 seed grant was successful! This means we’ll receive the necessary funding to run the LoRa (long range) radio demonstration we’ve been planning for National Science Week this August. Fantastic news. :smiley:

entry.title: New laser cutter
entry.content: We’re just taken delivery of a new (to us) 40W laser cutter, and we made the first few test cuts and engravings. We hope to do more of this on Tuesday at open night.
entry.summary: We’re just taken delivery of a new (to us) 40W laser cutter, and we made the first few test cuts and engravings. We hope to do more of this on Tuesday at open night.

entry.title: ABC Radio
entry.content:
One of our co-creators was in the radio station this morning plugging Hobart Makers.

Click here to hear it.
entry.summary: One of our co-creators was in the radio station this morning plugging Hobart Makers.

entry.title: Open to new members
entry.content: We’re now open to new members. Click here to join
entry.summary: We’re now open to new members. Click here to join

entry.title: First crochet workshop
entry.content: First crochet workshop went very well. Six students attended, and everyone enjoyed themselves and learned something. Thanks students.
entry.summary: First crochet workshop went very well. Six students attended, and everyone enjoyed themselves and learned something. Thanks students.

entry.title: Crochet workshop announced
entry.content:
Come along and learn the basic crochet stitches.

A ball of 100% wool yarn (8-ply) will be provided as part of the course price and a 4.0mm crochet hook will be available to borrow. The hooks will also available to purchase ($6), if you would like to take one home with you.
entry.summary: Come along and learn the basic crochet stitches.

entry.title: TasLUG are coming to Hobart Makers

link.title: TasLUG are coming to Hobart Makers

entry.content: TasLUG are coming to Hobart Makers on 16th Feb 2017. More details on the TasLUG facebook event page
entry.summary: TasLUG are coming to Hobart Makers on 16th Feb 2017. More details on the TasLUG facebook event page
